citation.article-title: Geoalkalibacter subterraneus sp. nov., an anaerobic Fe(III)- and Mn(IV)-reducing bacterium from a petroleum reservoir, and emended descriptions of the family Desulfuromonadaceae and the genus Geoalkalibacter.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the family Desulfuromonadaceae
The description is based on that given by Kuever et al. (2005) with the following amendment.
The family includes the genera Desulfuromonas, Desulfuromusa, Malonomonas, Pelobacter and Geoalkalibacter.
